thread.title: This Porsche 911 Carrera ‘Safari’ is the Ultimate Rally Car
thread.title_full: This Porsche 911 Carrera ‘Safari’ is the Ultimate Rally Car

author: Jesse Bernard
title: This Porsche 911 Carrera ‘Safari’ is the Ultimate Rally Car
text:
Visit the original post to see all 6 images from this gallery. 
The good folks at Kelly-Moss Road & Race modified the classic Porsche 911 Carrera into a fully-fledged armored vehicle, capable of enduring the harshest of conditions and environments.
Everything you see is built atop a 1989 Porsche 91/964 Carrera, beginning with the wheels and tires. Kelly-Moss Road & Race decided upon a set of custom Braid wheels wrapped within some Pirelli PZero rally tires. They also equipped the vehicle with some bolted on front and rear flares, reinforced suspension arms, armored front and rear bumpers, some hard-to-miss LED lights up front and around the perimeter of the car, tow hooks in the rear, and a rear hand brake.
In other lifestyle news, check out this futuristic BMW Alpha motorcycle which is unlike anything you’ve ever seen.
